Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two students trying to communicate over a distance.
The student can draw a device using a string and cups to show a way to communicate using sound.
The student can label how the device sends or receives information through sound.
The student can show the connection between the cups and the string to explain how sound travels.
The student can draw features that demonstrate the device helps people talk over a distance.
The student can indicate the materials used to build the device.
